nodes.text: The Bravis Sith were a group of Sith who were located in the Bravis system. They were considered ancient by the time of the Clone Wars, but some of their attire still existed. Their lightsaber crystals gave their lightsabers a sparkling effect.

The Bravis Sith were first mentioned in the description of the Ancient Bravis Sith gear in "Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures (video game)". Their lightsaber blades give the same sparkling effect as the Crimson Prowler Lightsaber Crystal.
